column4: are there someone who can tell me how to install things to gdesklets??
are there someone who can tell me how to install things to gdesklets??
are there someone who can tell me how to install sensors in gdesklets??
ignore that foul language.  Sorry he said that
what are you trying to do?
you can, but then you'll change the md5sum, and you'll have to read the top of your xorg.conf
and its not good when changing the mdd5sum?
as randabis put it, handy tools like dpkg-reconfigure and nvidia-glx-config won't work if  the md5sum is not correct
and were can i change the md5sum?
do you see the info at the top of /etc/X11/xorg.conf regarding md5sums?
you don't have to paste it
does it say something about the md5sum?
yes, you can even see that it does in what you pasted above ;)
ok, so when i have changed something in the conf. then i just have to cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.custom
no, not if you're using the binary nvidia drivers
